def.dt: :knowledge or understanding of something that has been obscure began to see daylight on the problem
:the quality or state of being open :openness
:mental soundness or stability :wits scared the daylights out of him
:a perceptible space, gap, or difference denied there was any daylight between the two governments' positions
:time usually one hour ahead of standard time called also daylight saving daylight savings daylight savings time daylight time
